author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Apn Outdoor Group FY ‍Profit For Year Attributable Down 9 Pct To $44 Mln​
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Apn Outdoor Group Ltd:
* FY ‍PROFIT FOR YEAR ATTRIBUTABLE DOWN 9% TO $44 MILLION​ * FY ‍ REVENUES FROM ORDINARY ACTIVITIES UP 4 PERCENT TO $342.9 MILLION ​
* ‍FINAL DIVIDEND OF 12.5 CENTS PER SHARE​ * FY18 CAPITAL EXPENDITURE EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE $25 MILLION TO $30 MILLION
* OVERHEAD GROWTH FOR FY18 IS EXPECTED TO BE 6% - 8% ‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
